home.title: Never Miss a Customer Again. Your 24/7 AI Agent.
home.subtitle: Turn missed calls into revenue. Aoun automatically answers customers, books appointments, answers FAQs, and qualifies leads, so you can focus on running your business.
home.featuresSubtitle: Give your customers instant, 24/7 service and give your staff time to focus on what matters most.

steps.title: 1. Train Your Agent
steps.text: Enter your website URL or upload your business documents. The AI will learn your information to become an expert on your business.

steps.title: 2. Customize Your Experience
steps.text: Choose a voice and personality for your agent, and define the tasks it will perform, from booking appointments to answering support queries.

steps.title: 3. Deploy Everywhere
steps.text: Activate your AI agent on phone, WhatsApp, or as a widget on your website to serve customers anytime, anywhere.

home.testimonialsSubtitle: See how Aoun has helped small and medium-sized businesses improve customer service and increase profits.
home.testimonial1Text: Answering reservation calls was taking up too much of my team's time. Now, Aoun handles all our bookings and inquiries flawlessly, letting us focus on our guests.
home.testimonial2Text: With Aoun, we no longer miss a single lead. It answers product questions 24/7 and captures contact info from interested shoppers, which has significantly boosted our sales.
home.testimonial3Text: The Aoun voice agent is our best employee! It schedules appointments and sends confirmations to patients, which has reduced no-shows and organized our entire workflow.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing for every business
pricing.subtitle: Start for free, upgrade as you grow. No long-term contracts or hidden fees.

footer.aboutText: We provide intelligent voice and chat agents to help businesses automate their customer service and grow.

dashboard_deploy.desc_embed: Add your intelligent agent to your website, mobile app, or messaging platforms.
dashboard_deploy.website_desc: For websites, you can embed our voice call widget directly. It handles the microphone UI and call state for you.
dashboard_deploy.mobile_desc: For mobile or custom integrations, use our REST API. It's platform-agnostic and works with any language that can make an HTTP request.
dashboard_deploy.instructions_step2: Paste it into the <body> tag of your website.
dashboard_deploy.instructions_step3: Replace 'YOUR_API_KEY' with your website widget's API key.
dashboard_deploy.toast_success_desc: The {type} has been copied to your clipboard.
dashboard_deploy.toast_error_desc: We could not copy the text. Please copy it manually.
dashboard_deploy.messaging_webhook_desc: Use this URL when configuring webhooks for WhatsApp or Messenger in the Meta Developer Portal. You will also need the Verify Token from the Admin Settings page.
dashboard_deploy.webhook_verify_token_desc: Meta/WhatsApp will ask for this verify token while setting up the webhook.
dashboard_deploy.token_note: Note: The token is shown once. After you set it in Meta's webhook verification, Meta will call your webhook with that token during verification.
dashboard_deploy.api_key_desc: Generate an API key for server-to-server integrations or private widgets.
dashboard_deploy.api_key_warning: The API key is shown once after creation — save it securely. Regenerating will invalidate the previous key.
dashboard_deploy.verify_token_generated: Verify token generated — copy it into Meta dev portal now
dashboard_deploy.api_key_generated: API key generated — copy it now

faq_page.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq_page.subtitle: Have questions? We have answers. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to contact us.
faq_page.q1: How does the AI agent learn about my business?
faq_page.a1: You can train the AI by providing your website URL or by uploading documents like product catalogs, service descriptions, or internal knowledge bases. The AI processes this information to answer customer questions accurately.
faq_page.q2: What happens if I go over my monthly voice minute limit?
faq_page.a2: On our paid plans, we offer overage billing at a specified rate per minute, so your service continues uninterrupted. You can monitor your usage in your dashboard.
faq_page.q3: Can I customize the agent's voice and personality?
faq_page.a3: Yes! You can choose from a library of high-quality voices and define a personality for your agent (e.g., friendly, formal, funny) to match your brand identity.
faq_page.q4: What platforms can I deploy the agent on?
faq_page.a4: You can deploy your agent as a voice assistant on your phone lines, a chat widget on your website, and as a text-based chatbot on platforms like WhatsApp and Facebook Messenger.
faq_page.q5: Is my business and customer data secure?
faq_page.a5: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption for all data in transit and at rest. We are committed to protecting your privacy and do not share your data with third parties. Please see our Privacy Policy for full details.
faq_page.q6: How long does it take to set up?
faq_page.a6: Setup is incredibly fast. You can train and configure your first agent in under 5 minutes. Integrating it with your phone or website is also a straightforward process with our provided instructions.

terms_page.title: Terms of Service
terms_page.subtitle: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our service.
terms_page.s1_content: By accessing or using the Aoun service ('Service'), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the Service.
terms_page.s2_content: Aoun provides AI-powered voice and chat agents designed to automate business communications. The Service includes agent configuration, training from your data sources, and deployment across various channels.
terms_page.s3_content: To use most features of the Service, you must register for an account. You are responsible for safeguarding your account password and for any activities or actions under your account. You must notify us immediately upon becoming aware of any breach of security or unauthorized use of your account.
terms_page.s4_content: Some parts of the Service are billed on a subscription basis. You will be billed in advance on a recurring and periodic basis ('Billing Cycle'). Your Subscription will automatically renew under the exact same conditions unless you cancel it or Aoun cancels it.
terms_page.s5_content: In no event shall Aoun, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of or inability to access or use the Service.

privacy_page.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_page.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. It is Aoun's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you.
privacy_page.s1_content: We only collect information about you if we have a reason to do so–for example, to provide our Services, to communicate with you, or to make our Services better. We collect this information from three sources: if and when you provide information to us, automatically through operating our Services, and from outside sources.
privacy_page.s2_content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to develop new services, and to protect Aoun and our users. We also use this information to offer you tailored content – like giving you more relevant search results and ads.
privacy_page.s3_content: We work hard to protect our users from unauthorized access to or unauthorized alteration, disclosure, or destruction of information we hold. We use industry-standard encryption for all data in transit and at rest.
privacy_page.s4_content: We retain personal information we collect from you where we have an ongoing legitimate business need to do so (for example, to provide you with a service you have requested or to comply with applicable legal, tax, or accounting requirements).
privacy_page.s5_content: You have the right to access, update, or delete the information we have on you. Whenever made possible, you can access, update, or request deletion of your Personal Information directly within your account settings section. If you are unable to perform these actions yourself, please contact us to assist you.
